text: Tony Dungy (born 1955, Jackson, Michigan) is a former American football coach. He won the Super Bowl in 2006 with the Indianapolis Colts. He now talks about football on NBC. He is an African-American. Dungy is a member of the Pro Football Hall of Fame. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official page Category:American football coaches Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Michigan Category:People from Jackson, Michigan
title: Tony Dungy
